#summary Summary of Service Verifications for Pandata

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

= Introduction =

Instructions for participation in the service verification for Pandata WP4 on 9 November 2012.

In order to participate in the service verification, you should do the following things:

 * inform Alistair Mills that you intend to participate;

 * download the materials and try the tests now;

 * inform Alistair if you have a service to offer;

 * attend the telco on Thursday 8/11/2012 at 14h UT;

 * inform Alistair of any technical difficulties.

If you have a service offer, send the connection inform to Alistair and he will test it, and publish the connection information into the SVN.  If you do not wish to publish the password, then tell Alistair.  As this is a very simple test to test ICATs, revealing a password to a test account on a test icat is very unlikely to weaken security of your Institute.  Be careful, your security officer may have another opinion!
 
Please read the following:

 * http://pandatawp4.wordpress.com/

 * http://code.google.com/p/icatproject/wiki/ServiceVerification

 * http://code.google.com/p/icatproject/source/browse/ops/icat42/test42/readme.txt

Please check out the materials using the following commands:
{{{
svn co https://icatproject.googlecode.com/svn/ops/icat40/test40
svn co https://icatproject.googlecode.com/svn/ops/icat41/test41
svn co https://icatproject.googlecode.com/svn/ops/icat42/test42
}}}
